name: MEC Outpost 35L Pack - Unisex
description: Back and tougher than ever, the Outpost daypack protects your laptop and other essentials on rainy commutes and adventures further afield. Rugged, waterproof fabrics and water-resistant (but not waterproof) zippers keep the insides dry in mean weather, with air mesh straps and a ventilated back panel for a comfortable carry in all conditions. Burly webbing handles make strong attachment points and are handy when you need to grab and run.Fabric is rugged 840-denier nylon, coated with polyurethane for waterproofness and abrasion resistance.Lined in 200-denier PU-coated nylon for extra water-stoppage.All zip closures are YKK reversed coil, durable and water-resistant (but not waterproof).Shoulder straps are cushioning 8mm EVA foam wrapped in super-tough 1680-denier nylon.Removable waistbelt is 38mm webbing, and attaches to durable bartacked loops via easy-to-use Gate Keeper buckles.Adjustable sternum strap.Airmesh on the backpanel and inside shoulder straps allows air to circulate.Stretch mesh side pocket carries a water bottle.Zippered bucket style opening to the main compartment.Multiple internal and external zippered mesh pockets for organization.Padded pocket holds a 15in. laptop and stops before the pack bottom to prevent fatal groundings.Strong 50mm webbing top and bottom handles.
